00028 typedef enum {CANON_PLANE_XY, CANON_PLANE_YZ, CANON_PLANE_XZ} CANON_PLANE;
00029 typedef struct {bool flood; bool mist; bool spindle;} coolantStruct;
00030 typedef enum {OFF,CW,CCW,BRAKE} SPINDLE_STATUS;
00031 
00037 class machineStatus: protected canon {
00038   protected:
00039     gp_Ax1 startPose, endPose;
00040     double F,S;  //feedrate, spindle speed
00041     SPINDLE_STATUS spindleStat;
00042     coolantStruct coolant;
00043     toolNumber myTool;
00044     static std::map<toolNumber, tool, std::less<toolNumber> > toolTable;
00045     CANON_PLANE plane;
00046   public:
00047     machineStatus(machineStatus const& oldStatus);

00049     void setPrevStatus(const machineStatus &oldStatus);
00050     void setEndPose(gp_Ax1 newPose) {endPose = newPose;};
00051     void setEndPose(gp_Pnt p);
00052     void setFeed(const double f) {F=f;};
00053     void setSpindleSpeed(const double s) {S=s;};
00054     void setSpindleStatus(SPINDLE_STATUS s);
00055     void setCoolant(coolantStruct c) {coolant = c;};
00056     void setTool(toolNumber n); //n is the tool to be used
00057     void setPlane(CANON_PLANE p) {plane = p;};
00058     double getFeed() const {return F;};
00059     double getSpindleSpeed() const {return S;};
00060     SPINDLE_STATUS getSpindleStatus() const {return spindleStat;};
00061     const coolantStruct getCoolant() {return coolant;};
00062     const gp_Ax1 getStartPose() {return startPose;};
00063     const gp_Ax1 getEndPose() {return endPose;};
00064     CANON_PLANE getPlane() const {return plane;};
00065     void clearAll(void);
00066   private:
00067     machineStatus();  //prevent use of this ctor by making it private
